content.rendered: LIGSMGPS – 868 is a single board solution based on SIMCOM SIM868 Module with inbuilt trace antenna. It is a complete Quad-Band GSM/GPRS module which combines GNSS technology for satellite navigation. Featuring an industry-standard interface and GNSS function, it allows variable assets to be tracked seamlessly at any location and anytime with signal coverage.

excerpt.rendered:
• Supply voltage range 3.4 ~ 4.4V
  • GPRS class 12: max. 85.6 kbps (downlink/uplink)
  • Quad-band 850/900/1800/1900MHz
  • Class 1(1W @1800/1900 MHZ)
  • Control via AT commands
  • Point-to-Point and cell broadcast
